PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-04402012-04-05,  ,  ,  AAFC, 
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectContributions to assist potato producers in New Brunswick
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide for FEDERAL CONTRIBUTIONS OF UP TO $5, 410,800 TO ASSIST POTATO PRODUCERS in NEW BRUNSWICK who were affected by extraordinary costs and losses resulting from excess moisture conditions during the 2011 crop year.
AttachmentsAttachment
